Description:May 4, 2021 ... About Pete and Gerry's Organics, LLC. The Pete and Gerry's Organics ... For additional information about Butterfly, please visit its website at ...
search_result.link_content_summary:
{
 "Summary": "Today, Butterfly, a Los Angeles-based private equity firm specializing in the food sector, announced that it has acquired a majority stake in Pete and Gerry's Organics, LLC, the nation's leading producer of organic, free-range and pasture-raised eggs under the Pete and Gerry's Organic®, Nellie's Free Range® and Consider Pastures™ brands.\n\nPete and Gerry’s is headquartered in Monroe, New Hampshire, with a second processing facility in Greencastle, Pennsylvania. The company traces its roots back to a small family farm in the late 1800s and has been raising chickens for three generations with an unrelenting commitment to bringing consumers the highest-quality eggs possible.",
 "Company Name": "Pete and Gerry’s Organics, LLC",
 "Email": "None",
 "Phone Number": "None",
 "Address": "Monroe, New Hampshire",
 "Product Information": "organic, free-range and pasture-raised eggs under the Pete and Gerry's Organic®, Nellie's Free Range® and Consider Pastures™ brands",
 "Representative": "Jesse Laflamme",
 "Useful Information": "Pete and Gerry's is a values-led company dedicated to humane treatment of animals and supporting small family farms who follow the strictest standards of humane animal treatment, safety, and environmental sustainability."
}
